transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning, main Alok baat kar raha hun India Mart se relationship manager, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Thank you aap boliye. available hai.
Executive: Kya?
Executive: Main keh raha hun sir hai kya abhi available office mein?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Achcha. Sir mera discussion karna tha wo leads wagerah ke regarding na abhi aap aap bhi by leads wagerah buy karti hai na mam?
Customer: Ah ha.
Executive: India Mart ka kaisa hai abhi feedback mam aapka?
Customer: Achcha hai. Aap kaise puchh lijiye is bare mein?
Executive: Hain?
Customer: Kaise puchh lijiye is bare mein?
Executive: Nahi main to sir se to discussion ho gaya tha kyuki lead pe aap bhi baat karti hai na to isliye main just janna chah raha tha.
Customer: Haan haan main hi baat karti hun.
Executive: Haan theek hai na response wagerah aa to raha hai na India Mart se mam?
Customer: Haan aa raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai mam koi dikkat nahi main ek baar sir se phir baat.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants feedback on IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Customer provided positive feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will talk to the customer's sir again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, buyleads, response
